Package model

Class TicketedEvent

Object
model.Event
model.TicketedEvent
public class TicketedEvent
extends Event
TicketedEvent represents an event that can be booked by Consumers. Tickets can be free, but they are required to attend, and there is a maximum cap on the number of tickets that can be booked.

  • Constructor Details

    • TicketedEvent

      public TicketedEvent​(long eventNumber, EntertainmentProvider organiser, String title, EventType type, double ticketPrice, int numTickets)
      Parameters:
      eventNumber - unique event identifier
      organiser - the EntertainmentProvider who created this event
      title - name of the event
      type - type of the event
      ticketPrice - price per ticket in GBP
      numTickets - maximum number of tickets, initially all available

  • Method Details

    • getOriginalTicketPrice

      public double getOriginalTicketPrice()
      Returns:
      The original ticket price (whether the event is sponsored or not)

    • getDiscountedTicketPrice

      public double getDiscountedTicketPrice()
      Returns:
      The original ticket price if the event is not sponsored, and a discounted price if it is

    • getNumTickets

      public int getNumTickets()
      Returns:
      Number of the maximum cap of tickets which were initially available

    • getSponsorAccountEmail

      public String getSponsorAccountEmail()
      Returns:
      The sponsor's PaymentSystem account email address if the event is sponsored, and null otherwise

    • isSponsored

      public boolean isSponsored()

    • setSponsorshipRequest

      public void setSponsorshipRequest​(SponsorshipRequest sponsorshipRequest)

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
